faq.title: Clear Answers, Expert Insights, Hassle Free Consulting Experience

items.question: What are company auditing services?
items.answer: Company auditing services provide UAE-based businesses with an unbiased opinion of their organisation's current financial health.

items.question: How long do company audits take in the UAE?
items.answer: An audit can take anywhere between 2 and 8 weeks, depending on your jurisdiction's requirements, company size, and complexity.

items.question: Are compliance audits mandatory for UAE companies?
items.answer: Yes, annual financial audits are essential for all-sized companies in the UAE Mainland to ensure transparency and compliance with the Emirate's stringent regulatory requirements.

items.question: Do audit firms assist with tax compliance too?
items.answer: Yes, most professional audit firms, including One Nexuz, assist UAE-based businesses with accounting, tax, and VAT services to help streamline personal and corporate finances.

items.question: Does One Nexuz ensure the confidentiality of my audit reports?
items.answer: Yes, all audit reports at One Nexuz are held in strict confidence, and only authorised personnel have access to the data.
